installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

## File: DMB Auto-Git Installer
## Repo: https://github.com/karsandor2022/DMB

# 1. Install Basic Tools
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq python3 build-essential

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# 2. Clean old files (Exclude .env and data to prevent data loss)
echo -e "üßπ Cleaning old files..."
find . -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 ! -name ".env" ! -name "node_modules" ! -name "data" -exec rm -rf {} +

# 3. Clone Repository directly from Source
echo -e "‚¨áÔ∏è  Cloning DMB from GitHub..."
git clone https://github.com/karsandor2022/DMB.git .

# 4. Install Dependencies
if [ -f "package.json" ]; then
    echo -e "üì¶ Installing dependencies via Yarn..."
    yarn install --production --frozen-lockfile || yarn install --production
else
    echo -e "‚ùå Error: package.json not found in the repository."
    exit 1
fi

echo -e "\n‚úÖ Installation Complete!"
